Module Screen
Package Application

Class ScheduleController

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
Application.ScheduleController
public class ScheduleController extends javafx.application.Application
Handles the fetching and rendering of data about consultants and their pomodoro schedules. The UI interface consists of a StackPane with a nested canvas. This is to facilitate further additions to the interface. Current limitation in UI resizing makes the UI dimensions defined on application launch, as opposed to runtime resizable.
Author:
Esben Christensen

    • timeToCanvasX

      public static double timeToCanvasX(LocalDateTime time, double canvasWidth)
      Returns the x value along the time axis in the applications timeline for a given time value.
      Parameters:
      time - The time parameter that is to be converted to a value x along the time axis.
      canvasWidth - Width of the timespan in pixels
      Returns:
      X value along the time axis

    • pixelsInTimespan

      public static double pixelsInTimespan(Duration time, double canvasWidth)
      Returns an amount of pixels represented by a timespan.
      Parameters:
      time - The time span
      canvasWidth - The width of the total timespan of 8 hours
      Returns:
      Timespan in pixels
